definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: GM to shut US plants up to 9 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車美國工廠將放假9周。

sentences.english: Hummer made GM seem like the gas-guzzler company.
sentences.chinese: 悍馬讓通用汽車看起來像是一家耗油大戶。

sentences.english: He initiated and managed technology collaborations with Chinese partners for GM.
sentences.chinese: 他爲通用汽車發起並管理與中國合作伙伴的技術協作。

sentences.english: The warranty period begins on the date of vehicle invoice.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車的保修期自購車發票日期起算。

sentences.english: Make-or-break week for GM as deadline nears .
sentences.chinese: 破產還是重組，通用汽車一週大限倒計時。

sentences.english: GM's domestic market share would drop from 22% to 17%.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車的國內市場份額將從22%降至17%。

sentences.english: General Motors has been hemorrhaging customers for decades.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車近幾十年來一直在流失消費者。

sentences.english: GM plans to begin selling the Volt in China starting later this year.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車打算在今年晚些時候讓沃特在中國上市銷售。

sentences.english: What the General Motors issue shows is that the multi-nationals are a law unto themselves.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車的聲明說明跨國公司都自行其是。

sentences.english: GM's global ad expenditure is estimated at a massive $3 billion.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車全球廣告費用估計可達30億美元。

sentences.english: It was held just a stone's throw from GM world headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 展會所在地距通用汽車的全球總部只有一石之遙。

sentences.english: The Obama administration's pre-packaged bankruptcy plan for General Motors is a recipe for disaster.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬政府的通用汽車破產方案必將成爲一場災難。

sentences.english: For General Motors, recovery always seems to be a case of two steps forward and one step back.
sentences.chinese: 對於通用汽車而言，恢復似乎是前進兩步倒退一步。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, GM said Spyker sealed a deal for Saab.
sentences.chinese: 週二通用汽車表示，世爵已完成收購薩博的交易。

sentences.english: GM and Chrysler's product-development operations are only now being reshaped.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽車和克萊斯勒的產品開發部門現在才進行重組。

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Elon Musk (1971-), business magnate and co-founder of Tesla Motors

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: South China Morning Post (newspaper in Hong Kong)
